# NOTE: XHTML extensions 
#      a[template]
#      img[ialign,size_type]
#      h1/../h6[name]
#      *[init|if|foreach|where|block|function]
if[test]
elseif[test]
else
foreach[var|in|where|test]
for[var|in|where|test]
expr[value]
js[value]
let[var|value]
define[var|value]
block[value]
*[ctor|init|if|foreach|where|block|function]

# unsafe HTML
a[accesskey|charset|class|coords|dir<ltr?rtl|href|hreflang|id|lang|onblur|onclick|ondblclick|onfocus|onkeydown|onkeypress|onkeyup|onmousedown|onmousemove|onmouseout|onmouseover|onmouseup|name|rel|rev|shape<circle?default?poly?rect|style|tabindex|title|target|template|type]
